title: Christ, Plate 7 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul

description: Christ as Salvator Mundi, in profile from PL, with long curly hair and short wavy beard; Christ has halo and holds his PR hand in blessing gesture, with an orb with a cross in his PL hand; text at bottom
